org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.streams.spi

Class Stage.FindFirst

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.streams.spi.Stage.FindFirst
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stage, Stage.Inlet
    Enclosing interface:
    Stage

    public static final class Stage.FindFirst
extends Object
implements Stage.Inlet
    A subscriber stage that emits the first element encountered.

    When built, the CompletionStage should emit an Optional of the first element emitted. If no element is emitted before completion of the stream, it should emit an empty optional. Once the element has been emitted, the stream should be cancelled if not already complete.

    If an error is emitted before the first element is encountered, the stream must redeem the completion stage with that error.
